about.title: About Me
about.text:
Senior Flutter Developer with 6 years of experience. I work on projects ranging from startup MVPs to enterprise systems with millions of users. At Yandex, I lead a development team and architect solutions for 100+ developers.

I'm motivated by creating quality, reliable solutions. I work with integrity — ensuring everything is rock-solid. I love complex technical challenges where you need to make the impossible possible.

Beyond code, I write music and speak at conferences. This develops creative thinking and helps me find unconventional solutions in development.

jobs.description:
Developing Yandex Pro — a super-app for drivers, couriers, and self-employed professionals with over 1 million active users.

I own the full cycle: from designing client-server interactions to leading cross-functional teams. I conduct code reviews and architecture reviews, and automate processes.
achievements: Designed feature module architecture for a team of 100+ developers, unified integrations between modules
Developed a redirection protocol for dynamically adding new logic branches without app updates
Implemented an AI bot for classifying and routing bug reports, reducing on-call developer workload
Mentored 5 interns to middle developer level
Conducted over 100 technical interviews on Flutter and algorithms
Led a major NDA project, coordinating internal teams and two contractors
jobs.tech: Flutter • Dart • BLoC • Clean Architecture • CI/CD

jobs.description: Taught Android development and Java. Trained 3 cohorts of students in mobile development fundamentals and object-oriented programming.
